00038   #define NEED_SEMICOLON do ; while (false)
00039 
00040   #define TRY_GROUP(group_name) {                               \
00041     AudioDevice* device = DoOpenDevice(group_name, parameters); \
00042     if (device) {                                               \
00043       return device;                                            \
00044     }                                                           \
00045   } NEED_SEMICOLON
00046 
00047   #define TRY_DEVICE(DeviceType) {                         \
00048     DeviceType* device = DeviceType::create(parameters);   \
00049     if (device) {                                          \
00050       return device;                                       \
00051     }                                                      \
00052   } NEED_SEMICOLON

00054 
00055   AudioDevice* DoOpenDevice(
00056     const std::string& name,
00057     const ParameterList& parameters)
00058   {
00059     ADR_GUARD("DoOpenDevice");
00060 
00061     #ifdef WIN32
00062 
00063       if (name == "" || name == "autodetect") {
00064         TRY_GROUP("directsound");
00065         TRY_GROUP("winmm");
00066         TRY_GROUP("openal");
00067         return 0;
00068       }
00069 
00070       if (name == "directsound") {
00071         TRY_DEVICE(DSAudioDevice);
00072         return 0;
00073       }
00074 
00075       if (name == "winmm") {
00076         TRY_DEVICE(MMAudioDevice);
00077         return 0;
00078       }
00079 
00080       #ifdef HAVE_OPENAL
00081         if (name == "openal") {
00082           TRY_DEVICE(ALAudioDevice);
00083           return 0;
00084         }
00085       #endif
00086 
00087       if (name == "null") {
00088         TRY_DEVICE(NullAudioDevice);
00089         return 0;
00090       }
00091 
00092     #else  // not Win32 - assume autoconf UNIX
00093 
00094       if (name == "" || name == "autodetect") {
00095         // in decreasing order of sound API quality
00096         TRY_GROUP("al");
00097         TRY_GROUP("oss");
00098         TRY_GROUP("openal");
00099         return 0;
00100       }
00101 
00102       #ifdef HAVE_OSS
00103         if (name == "oss") {
00104           TRY_DEVICE(OSSAudioDevice);
00105           return 0;
00106         }
00107       #endif
00108 
00109       #ifdef HAVE_OPENAL
00110         if (name == "openal") {
00111           TRY_DEVICE(OALAudioDevice);
00112           return 0;
00113         }
00114       #endif
00115 
00116       #ifdef HAVE_AL
00117         if (name == "al") {
00118           TRY_DEVICE(ALAudioDevice);
00119           return 0;
00120         }
00121       #endif
00122 
00123       if (name == "null") {
00124         TRY_DEVICE(NullAudioDevice);
00125         return 0;
00126       }
00127 
00128     #endif
00129 
00130     // no devices
00131     return 0;
00132   }
00133 
00134 
00135   class ThreadedDevice : public RefImplementation<AudioDevice> {
00136   public:
00137     ThreadedDevice(AudioDevice* device) {
00138       m_device = device;
00139       m_thread_exists = false;
00140       m_thread_should_die = false;
00141 
00143       AI_CreateThread(threadRoutine, this, 0);
00144     }
00145 
00146     ~ThreadedDevice() {
00147       m_thread_should_die = true;
00148       while (m_thread_exists) {
00149         AI_Sleep(50);
00150       }
00151     }
00152 
00153     // don't need to update the device...  the thread does it for us
00154     void ADR_CALL update() {
00155     }
00156 
00157     OutputStream* ADR_CALL openStream(SampleSource* source) {
00158       return m_device->openStream(source);
00159     }
00160 
00161     OutputStream* ADR_CALL openBuffer(
00162       void* samples, int frame_count,
00163       int channel_count, int sample_rate, SampleFormat sample_format)
00164     {
00165       return m_device->openBuffer(
00166         samples, frame_count,
00167         channel_count, sample_rate, sample_format);
00168     }
00169 
00170   private:
00171     void run() {
00172       m_thread_exists = true;
00173       while (!m_thread_should_die) {
00174         m_device->update();
00175       }
00176       m_thread_exists = false;
00177     }
00178 
00179     static void threadRoutine(void* arg) {
00180       ThreadedDevice* This = (ThreadedDevice*)arg;
00181       This->run();
00182     }
00183 
00184   private:
00185     RefPtr<AudioDevice> m_device;
00186     volatile bool m_thread_should_die;
00187     volatile bool m_thread_exists;
00188   };
00189 
00190 
00191   ADR_EXPORT(AudioDevice*, AdrOpenDevice)(
00192     const char* name,
00193     const char* parameters)
00194   {
00195     ADR_GUARD("AdrOpenDevice");
00196 
00197     if (!name) {
00198       name = "";
00199     }
00200     if (!parameters) {
00201       parameters = "";
00202     }
00203 
00204     // first, we need an unthreaded audio device
00205     AudioDevice* device = DoOpenDevice(
00206       std::string(name),
00207       ParameterList(parameters));
00208     if (!device) {
00209       return 0;
00210     }
00211 
00212     return new ThreadedDevice(device);
00213   }
